name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Guy DREXEL, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
O’BRIEN, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Guy DREXEL, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
O’BRIEN, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John A. Boccabella, Reading, for appellant.
Charles M. Guthrie, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
430 A.2d 1155
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Guy DREXEL, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 20, 1981.
Decided June 4, 1981.
John A. Boccabella, Reading, for appellant.
Charles M. Guthrie, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
